```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
source(here::here("R/functions.R"))
lipidomics <- read.csv(here::here("data/lipidomics.csv"))
```

## Basic statistics

```{r basic-stats}
lipidomics %>%
  group_by(metabolite) %>%
  summarise(across(value, list(mean = mean, sd = sd))) %>%
  mutate(across(where(is.numeric), ~ round(.x, digits = 1)))
```
